title: Meta beats expectations in Q2
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Meta reported robust second-quarter (Q2) financial results on Wednesday, with revenue jumping 22 percent year over year to $47.5 billion as the social media giant continues investing heavily in artificial intelligence (AI).
content: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Meta reported robust second-quarter (Q2) financial results on Wednesday, with revenue jumping 22 percent year over year to $47.5 billion as the social media giant continues investing heavily in artificial intelligence (AI)... [4146 chars]

title: ​Microsoft looks to spend record $30 billion
description: MICROSOFT forecast on Wednesday a record $30 billion in capital spending for the current fiscal first quarter, after booming sales in its Azure cloud computing business showcased the growing returns on its massive bets on artificial intelligence (AI).
content: MICROSOFT forecast on Wednesday a record $30 billion in capital spending for the current fiscal first quarter, after booming sales in its Azure cloud computing business showcased the growing returns on its massive bets on artificial intelligence (AI)... [4413 chars]

title: Samsung Q2 operating profits plummets 50%
description: SEOUL — South Korean tech giant Samsung Electronics’ operating profit dropped by more than 50 percent year on year in the second quarter (Q2), its regulatory filing showed on Thursday, as US curbs on artificial intelligence (AI) chip exports to China hit sales.
content: SEOUL — South Korean tech giant Samsung Electronics’ operating profit dropped by more than 50 percent year on year in the second quarter (Q2), its regulatory filing showed on Thursday, as US curbs on artificial intelligence (AI) chip exports to China... [2723 chars]

title: Microsoft surges on robust cloud growth, record AI spending
description: Microsoft Corp. said it will spend more than $30 billion in the current quarter to build out the data centers powering its artificial intelligence services.
content:
(Bloomberg/Matt Day) — Microsoft Corp. said it will spend more than $30 billion in the current quarter to build out the data centers powering its artificial intelligence services.

title: Big Tech's AI Bets Propel Record Highs in S&P 500 and Nasdaq
description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq hit record highs as significant earnings from Meta and Microsoft showcase the success of their artificial intelligence investments, driving Big Tech forward. The Dow Jones also saw a notable increase, highlighting a positive movement across major stock indices on Thursday.
content: In a significant market move, the S&P 500 and Nasdaq surged to record highs on Thursday. This upswing came on the heels of impressive earnings reports from tech giants Meta and Microsoft, proving the effectiveness of their major investments in artifi... [477 chars]

title: AI Surge: Tech Giants Amplify Investments Amid Rising Returns
description: Big Tech companies, including Microsoft, Meta, and Alphabet, are heavily investing in artificial intelligence, resulting in record-breaking revenue growth. The increasing demand for AI services in internet search, digital advertising, and cloud computing is attracting investor confidence and shielding these companies from broader economic uncertainties.

title: AI uncovers new lipid-lowering effects in existing FDA-approved drugs
description: In a breakthrough for cardiovascular medicine, researchers have harnessed artificial intelligence to discover unexpected lipid-lowering effects in existing FDA-approved drugs.
